headline: Lowe's to Participate in Virtual Fireside Chat Hosted by Oppenheimer & Co. Inc.
summary: Lowe's Companies, Inc. (NYSE: LOW) announces that Marvin R. Ellison, chairman and chief executive officer, and Brandon J. Sink, chief financial officer, will participate in a virtual fireside chat hosted by Oppenheimer & Co. Inc.
